name: DNO Rasa's Journey
description: Guide Rasa on her journey as she collects lost DNA, and breathes life back into the broken planet. DNO is a continuous side-scrolling platformer that shows remnants of the once great planet Lira. Unlock creatures that once dwelled here, through the use of a unique card collection system, and use power-ups to make your way through each...
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista Processor: 2. GHz Duo Memory: 512 MB RAM
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2. GHz Quad Memory: 512 MB RAM
